metadata.title: CVE-2012-3529 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The configuration module in the backend in TYPO3 4.5.x before 4.5.19, 4.6.xbefore 4.6.12 and 4.7.x before 4.7.4 allows remote authenticated backendusers to obtain the encryption key via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3529` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

typo3 - 4.5.19+dfsg1-1
typo3-database - 4.5.19+dfsg1-1
typo3-dummy - 4.5.19+dfsg1-1
typo3-src-4.5 - 4.5.19+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: typo3-src package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.19+dfsg1-1').
